SELECT CONCAT('case-' , a.id_medicalrec) AS id , a.id_medicalrec_ca AS pId , a. NAME , 1 AS open , IF(b.id_testplan_medicalrec is null,0,1) checked FROM faq_medicalrec a LEFT JOIN exm_testplan_medicalrec b ON a.id_medicalrec = b.id_medicalrec AND b.id_testplan = #{extId} WHERE fg_active = '1'

SELECT a.id_testplan_medicalrec, a.id_testplan, a.id_medicalrec, a.sort, fm.name, fm.id_demo, fm.id_medicalrec_ca, fm.id_org, fm.sd_level, fm.sd_use, fm.count, fm.fg_active, fm.fg_valid, fm.creator, fm.gmt_create, fm.operator, fm.gmt_modify, so.name as orgName FROM exm_testplan_medicalrec a LEFT JOIN faq_medicalrec fm ON a.id_medicalrec = fm.id_medicalrec LEFT JOIN sys_org so on fm.id_org = so.id_org WHERE id_testplan = #{idTestplan} ORDER BY a.sort
